!Varka's Messenger Naran Ashanuk: What are you still doing here? Get to the battlefield immediately! You've committed to bring *200 badges of Ketra grunts and 100 badges of Ketra officers*. Get the officers' badges from *Ketra Orc Warriors, lieutenants, mediums, elite soldiers, centurions, seers, legionnaire captains, and elite royal guards*. If you don't like this job, you're always welcome to quit!
